name: Hellevator (Team Bacon x Pogo)
description:
Hello this is my Ludum Dare 48 Gamejam Entry, you can vote for me on https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$240357

 

Hellevator

--------------------------------------------------

Use the Hellavator, go to hell, and fight Lucifer and his demons.

HOW TO PLAY

Use A and D to move around

Stay out of the demons' reach

To go down faster and dodge incoming spikes (X marks) keep power the generator

SPACE to interact with the generator

Fill the shape on the wall to cast spell against the demons

GO TO THE BOTTOM AND DEFEAT LUCIFER TO WIN
